t: CFMoto - Wikipedia

t: r/ATV on Reddit: Is cfmoto a Chinese brand to stay away from ??
s: February 1, 2023 - It's the more established of the Chinese brands. That being said, their bar for quality control is...basically the floor. You may luck out with a new one for a couple of years, then sell it to be someone else's future problem. Buddy of mine has a 1000cc loaded out one and it does alright, but it doesn't keep up well with the rest of ours in the Rockies whether in deep snow or on the gnarly stuff. Though he's a pretty hefty dude too, which doesn't help haha ... The 1000 CFMoto ...

t: Homepage - CFMOTO
s: April 1, 2025 - I veicoli CFMOTO sono coperti da garanzia contro i difetti di fabbricazione per un periodo di due anni dalla data di consegna, percorrenza illimitata. La garanzia ha validità su tutto il territorio italiano, Repubblica di S.Marino compresa, ed è applicata solo dopo un esame di un tecnico ...
